appSubtitle: Forms for ME/CFS. In your Browser. All data stays on your device.
feedbackIntro: Please do not include any patient or health data.
shareCopyInstructions: Copy the link below to share it.
shareCopiedDescription: The link is in your clipboard. Share it with others.
formpackListErrorFallback: Unable to load formpacks right now.
formpackLoadError: Unable to load this formpack right now.
formpackNotFound: This formpack could not be found.
formpackUnsupported: This formpack uses a locale that is not supported yet.
formpackSchemaNotFound: The form schema file is missing.
formpackSchemaInvalid: The form schema file is invalid.
formpackSchemaUnavailable: The form schema could not be loaded.

formpackDocxErrorInvalidCommand: DOCX template error: A command is invalid or mismatched.

importInvalidPayload: Import payload is incomplete or invalid.

importNoActiveRecord: Select an active draft before overwriting.
